thread.title: WBSEDCL Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 112 Asst Engineer Posts
thread.title_full: WBSEDCL Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 112 Asst Engineer Posts

author: publisher12
title: WBSEDCL Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 112 Asst Engineer Posts

organizations.name: west bengal state electricity distribution company limited
information technology/ computer science/ electronics/electronics & telecommunication/ electronics & communication

text: WBSEDCL Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 112 Asst Engineer Posts WBSEDCL Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 112 Asst Engineer Posts: West Bengal State Electricity Distribution Company Limited (WBSEDCL) has published notification for the recruitment of 112 Assistant Engineer vacancies for various disciplines. Eligible candidates may apply online from 27-02-2017 at 10:00 AM to 24-03-2017 midnight. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below…. WBSEDCL Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 112 Name of the Post: Assistant Engineer Name of the Discipline: 1. Electrical Engineering: 57 Posts 2. Civil: 38 Posts 3. Information Technology & Communication: 17 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be between 18 – 27 years as on 01-01-2016. Age relaxation is applicable to 10 years for PWD Candidates. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess B.E/ B.Tech/ B.Sc (Engineering) Degree in Electrical Engineering/ Electrical & Electronics (Combined)/ Power Engineering/ B.Sc (H) in Physics with 03 years B.Tech in Electrical Engineering from any Institute approved by AICTE/ IITs for Sl No. 01, BE/ B.Tech/ B.Sc (Engg) Degree in Civil Engineering/ Construction Engineering from any Institute approved by AICTE/ IITs for Sl No. 02 or Degree in respective branch of Engineering from a recognized University/ Institute duly approved by AICTE/ AMIE & B.E/ B.Tech/ B.Sc (Engg) Degree in Information Technology/ Computer Science/ Electronics/Electronics & Telecommunication/ Electronics & Communication/ M.Sc (Computer Science)/ MCA/ B.Sc (Hons) with B.Tech (03 Years duration) in Computer Science and Engineering from any Institute approved by AICTE/IITs for Sl No. 03. Final year candidates are also eligible to apply. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on GATE 2017 Score & interview. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 400/- with service charges should be deposited in any branch of United Bank of India through a triplicate Challan (One copy of Challan will be retained by the bank and two copies of Challan will be handed over to the candidate by the bank). No fee for SC/ ST/ PWD candidates. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.wbsedcl.in from 27-02-2017 at 10:00 AM to 24-03-2017 midnight & send hard copy of the online application with relevant documents and challan in an envelope should be super scribed with “Name of the Post Applied for” by ordinary post to the Advertiser, Post Bag No 781, Circus Avenue Post Office, Kolkata – 700 017 on or before 31-03-2017. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Candidates log on the website www.wbsedcl.in 2. Click on Careers & Select the desired post 3. Read all instructions & fill all the details 4. Check once before submit the form 5. Now take a print out of online application for future use. Important Dates: Starting Date to Apply Online & Payment of Fee: 27-02-2017 at 10:00 AM Last Date to Apply Online & Payment of Fee: 24-03-2017 midnight Last Date for Receipt of Hard Copy of the Online Application: 31-03-2017 For more details like pay scale, reservation, grade pay, pay band & other information click on the link given below….
